TEXT.TITLE: SYRIA SEEKING WHITE SUGAR ON APRIL 8 - TRADE
TEXT.BODY: Syria will hold a buying tender on April 8 for 36,000 tonnes of white sugar for shipment in June, July and August at a rate of 12,000 tonnes a month, traders said. REUTER
